channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: You told us your financial New Year’s resolutions. Here’s how to make them happen.
item.description: MarketWatch readers shared their money goals for 2026. These tips can help them — and you — embrace habits to build wealth, pay down debt, and more.

item.title: ‘I’m fed up’: My selfish mother-in-law has controlled me for 30 years. How can I regain my power?
item.description: “I’m almost 50 years old. Enough is enough. I am exhausted by it.”

item.title: These overlooked indicators say tech stocks may not lead the market in 2026
item.description: Tech sector is over-owned and vulnerable to being hit with ‘loser’ tag, says Wall Street veteran

item.title: How saving as little as $12 a week can add up to $110,000 in retirement
item.description: Every week, Don’t Short Yourself will feature money tips to help you earn it, stack it and grow it.

item.title: BYD overtakes Tesla to become top seller of electric vehicles — and the gap is big
item.description: Chinese rival BYD became the biggest global seller of battery-powered vehicles last year, according to figures released on Friday.

item.title: Mizuho says tariff relief could drive next leg higher for Wayfair
item.description: Mizuho's $130 price target implies a 29% upside for shares of Wayfair.

item.title: These chip stocks were among the top 2025 performers on our Best Stocks list. What we expect from them in 2026
item.description: Josh Brown and Sean Russo look through these two chip names on their Best Stocks list — and what's ahead for them in 2026.

item.title: Jefferies says this Chinese tech giant will get a boost from its AI chip subsidiary spinoff
item.description: Jefferies' new price target implies a 39% upside ahead for shares of Baidu.

item.title: Exxon is breaking out at the turn of the new year. Why Jay Woods thinks it's a buy
item.description: This is not what one would expect with crude oil trading under $60 a barrel and nearing new 52-week lows.

item.title: Buffett says Berkshire has the best odds of any company for lasting 100 more years as he hands over reins
item.description: Berkshire has "a better chance I think of being here 100 years from now than any company I can think of," Buffett said.

item.title: Holy Ship! HII Stock Jumps on Trump Navy Ship Plans

item.title: DBVT Stock Rockets on Positive Peanut Allergy Patch Trial

item.title: Trump’s Weed Pivot Ignites CGC Stock Surge
item.description: Canopy Growth (CGC) surges 50%+ as Trump eyes marijuana reclassification. Explore the buzz, risks, and trading lessons in this volatile sector.
